alert.note: Alert for Southern Columbia; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Columbia and eastern Suwannee Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 759 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Live Oak to near Obrien. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Live Oak, Ichetucknee Spring, Columbia, Wellborn, Five Points, Watertown, Lulu, Obrien and Mcalpin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northern Florida.
